messages.content: You are a data analyst. Given this dataset summary: Columns: Title, Worldwide, Domestic, Domestic percent, Foreign, Foreign percent,  Sample data: Avengers: Endgame	$2,797,501,328 	$858,373,000 	30.70%	$1,939,128,328 	69.30% Please provide:- 5 key business KPIs with brief definitions- Any interesting trends or anomalies- Suggestions for visualization- If possible, a SQL query to calculate 1-2 KPIs
Generate insight report of my data
